#summary Method baseMaterialsForTypeName details

= /baseMaterialsForTypeName/(typeName) =

List of base materials for given item typeName.

== Attributes ==

|| materialTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| materialTypeGraphicIcon || String ||
|| materialTypeID || Number ||
|| materialTypeName || String ||
|| quantity || Number ||

== Examples ==

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeName/blah-blah baseMaterialsForTypeName/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)
